Name: The Frosted Hope in Our Stars
AttributesDescription: An item serving as access to the Birthday Celebration. Used to review blessings sent by your companions.
BgDescription:
Cream, icing, chiffon cake... every ingredient handpicked by your friends to craft this little “sweet dream,” all for the sake of your gentle smile as you make your wish.
Take a bite, and you’ll taste soft, warm memories: the days you shared, the hopes left unspoken, all blending into the cake’s comforting aroma.
ObtainedShowDescription: An anonymously gifted birthday cake, brimming with warm wishes and blessings.
